title: #79 - Violence In, Violence Out - The Unraveledness of Mandy Meloon
description:
This week, we look at a woman who went from the glory of Olympic promise, and the potential admiration of her entire country to being wrestled to the ground after fighting with a police officer about the legality of petting his horse. And that's the least crazy thing she's done! Find out what happens when systemic abuse is ignored, and mixed with the fire of a truly unhinged person... It's a deadly cocktail. Kick your room mate in the face, spit at a police officer, and expose yourself in the psyche ward with Mandy Meloon!!Check us out, every Tuesday.
